articles.author: Homero De la Fuente, Charlie Webster
articles.title: Tour Championship: Viktor Hovland wins PGA Tour finale and $18 million FedEx Cup prize - CNN
articles.description: Norwegian Viktor Hovland fended off a late surge by American Xander Schauffele to finish at 27 under par and win the Tour Championship on Sunday at East Lake Golf Club in Atlanta.
articles.content:
Norwegian Viktor Hovland fended off a late surge by American Xander Schauffele to finish at 27 under par and win the Tour Championship on Sunday at East Lake Golf Club in Atlanta.
